timeline.message: Fix ProfileActivationException caused by ubounded version range
Fix ProfileActivationException caused by ubounded version range

timeline.bodyText: This would work, but isn't mvn versions:set -DnewVersion=${NEW_SNAPSHOT_VERSION} more reliable?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText:
I originally went with that but it wasn't setting set some of the properties in the BOMs. E.g:
    <properties>
        <camel-quarkus.version>1.1.0-SNAPSHOT</camel-quarkus.version><!-- kept in sync with project.version by the release plugin -->
    </properties>
replies.author: jamesnetherton
